change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Topics covered are the affiliation with the City Federation of Women's Clubs, social activities, salary increases, sending a delegate to the National Education Association convention, a recommendation for a publicity campaign if the salary budget of January 1920 proved unsatisfactory, affiliation with the State Welfare League, and with the New York State Teachers Association (Dec. 1920), salaries during illness, group insurance plans, and other routine business and social matters. (last few pages include handwritten articles of the constitution, November 1932.)

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Club was organized November 6, 1918 at "a meeting of several teachers representing all the public schools of Ithaca, NY." The first elected president was Sara Kelly.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Topics covered are the affiliation with the City Federation of Women's Clubs, social activities, salary increases, sending a delegate to the National Education Association convention, a recommendation for a publicity campaign if the salary budget of January 1920 proved unsatisfactory, affiliation with the State Welfare League, and with the New York State Teachers Association (Dec. 1920), salaries during illness, group insurance plans, and other routine business and social matters. (last few pages include handwritten articles of the constitution, November 1932.)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ithaca Teachers Association Minute book #5710. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /4212: Kheel Center Current Documents Correspondence 5697: James A. Gross Arbitration Files 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6174/004: NYSUT Field Services Department Files 6185: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Records

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Handwritten minute book, includes handwritten copy of the union constitution. 67 pp.
